name: Sonic the Helicopter
description:
Sonic and his friends were chillin' but Eggman wanted to get his revenge on Sonic so he secretly installed a propeller into Sonic's head when he was sleeping. When it was morning Eggman turned on the propeller and Sonic started flying into the sky, Sonic couldn't control or destroy the propeller so he tries to dodge the meteorites. 

Don't go into the meteorites or you'll die. Collect 30 rings and go to 'HERE' to win.
